entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView IsEnabled does not appear to work. #19768
  • Physical iPad Air 2 (Software Version 15.8) will not run new MAUI app #19764
  • Users require .NET 8 to be downloaded separately to run WinUI app #19763
  • [Android] ShellContent Visibility change leads to KeyNotFoundException: Microsoft.Maui.Controls.SetterSpecificity #19762
  • Documentation / feature request: global error handling #19761
  • Directory.GetCurrentDirectory() resturns C:\\Windows\\system32 #19760
  • апп #19759
  • Annoying exceptions when debugging (but which are swallowed at runtime) #19758
  • iOS App extensions with UseMauiEssentials=true don't bundle Microsoft.Maui.Essentials.dll #19756
  • [testing] GroupListViewHeaderIndexOutOfRangeTest test is failing on IOS #19755
    Backlog
  • [UITest] Investigate adding coordinate clicking to the Tap feature for catalyst #19754
    Backlog
  • Button with `Command` and `Style` does not behave properly when pointer hovers over the button #19752
    Backlog
  • Unable to set Button opacity on press. #19751
    Backlog
  • iOS 12.4.4 - ENTRY control | Arg_NullReferenceException | at TextFieldExtensions.GetClearButtonTintImage #19748
    Backlog
  • Shell BackButtonBehavior TextOverride property not working as expected #19747
    Backlog
  • Unable to connect to mac #19746
  • [iOS] Allow UpdateTabBarHidden method in ShellItemRenderer to be overridden #19745
    Backlog
  • WebView control not loading document from the local file storage #19743

Closed

  • [Testing] Replace uses of Wait with an implementation that fails when the condition is never true #19376
    Backlog
  • Unintended entry focus change in `ScrollView` #19733
    Backlog
  • Maui Splash Screen and AppIcon will not update on iOS App , #19732
  • IDE Issue regarding Hot Reload #19742
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET 8.0.200 preview SDK installed, Error "NU3004: The package is not signed." for Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Aspire.Manifest-8.0.100.8.0.0-preview.3.24054.2 happens when installing workloads. #19704
  • Title: hello issues #19717
  • Border is not displayed when inside a Frame in .net 8 #19726
  • I want to participate! I am going to be taking my first C# classes next week! Love where this is going! #19731

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix SetProgressViewOffset on SwipeRefreshLayout #19767
  • Add basic docs for ScrollView implementations #19766
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - Maui Community Toolkit Popup #19765
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard
  • Fix condition to bundle Microsoft.Maui.Essentials.dll in app extensions on Apple platforms. Fixes #19756. #19757

Merged

  • Clean up async assertions #19385
  • [net8.0] Update with main #19381
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update eng/README.md #19735
    community ✨

Updated

  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fix page swap from background #19532
    stale
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #19472
    area/essentials 🍞, stale
  • Removes dead code from type conversion #19436
    community ✨, stale
  • Expose generic delegates for BindableProperty via Create method #19431
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨, stale
  • Add animated GIF support for Image #19411
    area/image :framed_picture:, stale
  • Add GCs to better validate GC related issue paths #19409
    stale
  • [Trimming] Fix several trimming warnings #19402
    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • Do not use underscores in the ApplicationId #19377
    area/templates 📄, stale
  • Allow for disabling default MAUI usings when embedding #19314
    area/native-embedding, stale
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale
  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, stale, .NET 8 SR2
  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale
  • Disallow `NaN`s in `Rect` sizes #18971
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, stale
  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
    area/layout 🔲, partner/android, stale
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing, stale
  • - [Android] Fix ShouldShowToolbarButton for FlyoutPage #18522
    area/FlyoutPage, community ✨, stale
  • set the parents to installer #18086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, stale
  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (2) #17671
    area/architecture, community ✨, stale
  • [Android] Fix RefreshView loading indicator position #17647
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, stale
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, stale, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, stale, Under Consideration
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, stale, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, stale, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • [xamlg] improve error for Xamarin.Forms namespace #19683
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [iOS] Fix Flyout layout #19125
    area/shell 🐢
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, stale, memory-leak 💦
  • [WinUI] Add workaround for Connectivity check on Win10 #19261
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, area/desktop 🖥️, partner/cat 😻
  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • [Hosting] Register ImageSource services as KeyedServices #19641
    area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 9 Planning
  • Fix disappearing cell issue for TableView on Android #19723
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/ListView
  • Picker ItemsSource fixes #19728
    community ✨
  • Devices.Sensors.Location: rework argument handling in constructors #19459
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 SR3
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 SR3
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, stale
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Avoid crash using RotateYTo and RotateXTo #18484
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬, platform/windows 🪟, stale
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test G1 #18616
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D22 #18725
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D8 #18760
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
  • Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #19048
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Testing] Added appium UITest for FlyoutNavigationBetweenItemsWithNavigationStacks #19444
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/gestures
